Package se.swedenconnect.spring.saml.idp.autoconfigure.settings

package se.swedenconnect.spring.saml.idp.autoconfigure.settings
Settings for the SAML IdP.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CredentialConfiguration
    Configuration class for IdP credentials.
    IdentityProviderAutoConfiguration
    Configuration class for Identity Provider general settings.
    IdentityProviderConfigurationProperties
    Main configuration properties class for the SAML Identity Provider.
    IdentityProviderConfigurationProperties.AssertionSettingsConfigurationProperties
    Configuration properties for assertion settings.
    IdentityProviderConfigurationProperties.CredentialConfigurationProperties
    Configuration properties for the IdP credentials.
    IdentityProviderConfigurationProperties.EndpointsConfigurationProperties
    Configuration properties for endpoint configuration.
    IdentityProviderConfigurationProperties.MetadataConfigurationProperties
    Configuration properties for IdP metadata.
    IdentityProviderConfigurationProperties.MetadataConfigurationProperties.ContactPerson
    Settings for the ContactPerson metadata element.
    IdentityProviderConfigurationProperties.MetadataConfigurationProperties.EncryptionMethod
    Settings for md:EncryptionMethod elements.
    IdentityProviderConfigurationProperties.MetadataConfigurationProperties.Organization
    Settings for the Organization metadata element.
    IdentityProviderConfigurationProperties.MetadataConfigurationProperties.SigningMethod
    Settings for alg:SigningMethod elements.
    IdentityProviderConfigurationProperties.MetadataConfigurationProperties.UIInfo
    Settings for the metadata UIInfo element.
    IdentityProviderConfigurationProperties.MetadataConfigurationProperties.UIInfo.Logo
    Representation of a Logo element.
    IdentityProviderConfigurationProperties.MetadataProviderConfigurationProperties
    Configuration properties for metadata provider configuration.
    IdentityProviderConfigurationProperties.MetadataProviderConfigurationProperties.HttpProxy
    Configuration properties for an HTTP proxy.
    IdentityProviderConfigurationProperties.ReplayCheckerConfigurationProperties
    For configuring the message replay checker.
    IdentityProviderConfigurationProperties.SessionConfiguration
    Session handling configuration.
    MessageReplayCheckerAutoConfiguration
    Autoconfiguration for setting up a MessageReplayChecker bean.
    MessageReplayCheckerAutoConfiguration.RedisMessageReplayCheckerConfiguration
    For configuration of a RedisReplayCache bean.
    MetadataResolverConfiguration
    Configuration class that ensures that we have a MetadataResolver bean.
